unnormalised: Arrey yaar, cart abandonment? It's like leaving a half-eaten plate of biryani! So wrong! Did the shipping cost suddenly jump to Mumbai from Delhi like Rs. 500? Or did auntyji call at 6 PM demanding chai pakoras? We get it! Happens. Maybe next time, right? Check back before 15/08, we might have a sale! Don't be a Kanjoos Seth! 09:00 hrs is tea time. Finish shopping!
